overview: Valor Bare Knuckle, Inc. (Valor BK) is a well-organized bare-knuckle promotion company organized in Cheyenne, Wyoming. It’s owned and operated by UFC Hall of Famer and WWF legend Ken Shamrock.  Valor BK is similar to UFC, WWE, or any major boxing promotion that hosts combat sports live events.  But Valor BK's fights are different, edgier, and packed full of exhilarating bare-knuckle fights.  Valor BK hosts live, televised, and streaming bare-knuckle fights for fight fans worldwide. Valor BK delivers raw exhilarating entertainment for anyone who likes a good ‘ol fashioned stand-up fist fight.  At its core, Valor BK is a media company that creates exciting sports entertainment content by securing and promoting bare-knuckle bouts.  Valor BK’s live and recorded events will be nationally and internationally distributed on network, digital, and pay-per-view (PPV) platforms.
title: VBK 1 Valor Bare Knuckle
